alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 1:40PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of east central Miami-Dade County through 215 PM EST... At 139 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower over Pinecrest, or over Coral Gables, moving south around 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Homestead, Coral Gables, Key Biscayne, South Miami, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, Turkey Point, Kendall, The Redland, Pinecrest, Florida City, West Miami, Homestead Base, Westchester, Naranja, Glenvar Heights, Richmond Heights, Leisure City and Palmetto Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
